mutants.code:
def reverse_array(arr):
    start = 1
    end = len(arr) - 1
    while start < end:
        (arr[start], arr[end]) = (arr[end], arr[start])
        start += 1
        end -= 1
    return arr

def reverse_array(arr):
    start = -1
    end = len(arr) - 1
    while start < end:
        (arr[start], arr[end]) = (arr[end], arr[start])
        start += 1
        end -= 1
    return arr
